title: New game mode for 1v1 and 2v2
body: Dear riot please make a game mode for 1v1 and 2v2's with a new map for each. That would be Awesome!

replies.body:
Yo, 1v1 me bro! Jk!

On a serious note, if you'd like this to be potentially seen by teams that work on game modes, you'll want to post this on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous). ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
